title: Fonseka rejects UNP
content: DM Online – By Jamila Najmuddin – (Pix: Getty images) DNA Leader General Sarath Fonseka has rejected an offer to join the UNP after an invitation was extended to him by UNP Deputy Leader Karu Jayasuriya last week, DNA MP Vijitha Herath told Daily Mirror online. Herath said that the General who was not even…
